title: Variable.RoiPooling2d_forward doesn't actually work
body_html:
(/home/ezyang/Dev/pytorch-cuda9-env) ezyang@autobox:~/Dev/pytorch-cuda9$ python
Python 3.6.3 |Anaconda, Inc.| (default, Nov 20 2017, 20:41:42) 
[GCC 7.2.0] on linux
Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.
>>> import torch
>>> torch._C._VariableBase.RoiPooling2d_forward(torch.autograd.Variable(torch.DoubleTensor([0])), torch.autograd.Variable(torch.LongTensor([0])), 0, 0, 0)
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
RuntimeError: RoiPooling2d_forward is not implemented for type Variable[torch.DoubleTensor]

Looking at VariableType.cpp it seems that the method for RoiPooling2d_forward is never generated.

(Also, there is no test for RoiPooling2d)

CC @gchanan

body:
```
(/home/ezyang/Dev/pytorch-cuda9-env) ezyang@autobox:~/Dev/pytorch-cuda9$ python
Python 3.6.3 |Anaconda, Inc.| (default, Nov 20 2017, 20:41:42) 
[GCC 7.2.0] on linux
Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.
>>> import torch
>>> torch._C._VariableBase.RoiPooling2d_forward(torch.autograd.Variable(torch.DoubleTensor([0])), torch.autograd.Variable(torch.LongTensor([0])), 0, 0, 0)
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
RuntimeError: RoiPooling2d_forward is not implemented for type Variable[torch.DoubleTensor]
```

Looking at `VariableType.cpp` it seems that the method for `RoiPooling2d_forward` is never generated.

(Also, there is no test for RoiPooling2d)

CC @gchanan
